dances: /me %%NAME%% is doing a moonwalk! On the actual Moon.
/me %%NAME%% is rocking! Hold tight!
/me %%NAME%% is moving gracefully like a swan and… now is flying. Judges are in awe.
/me Dance, Dance! %%NAME%% is falling apart to half time. Dance, dance!
/me %%NAME%% is anxiously looking at the dancefloor. The dancefloor is looking back.
/me %%NAME%% is wondering idly, are we human or are we dancer?
/me We are raising the stakes! %%NAME%% is dancing on them. It looks painful.
/me %%NAME%%, is your body a cage? Here's the key: ♮. Now go dance!
/me Today in Dancing with the Stars %%NAME%% will dance with Alpha Centauri. She looks hot!
/me Uh-oh. Apparently, %%NAME%% has two left feet. We are looking for the owner of the second one.
/me %%NAME%% is moving slightly on the chair to the rhythm of the music.
/me %%NAME%% owns the dancefloor! And charges for entrance.
/me %%NAME%% is dancing on the table, throwing food and drinks away.
/me %%NAME%% is reading about people dancing.
/me %%NAME%% is dancing and singing in the rain while jumping up the lamposts.
/me %%NAME%%'s dance is drawing attention of people around like the Great Attractor.
/me It's Yule Ball! %%NAME%%, put on your robe and wizard hat and dance!
/me %%NAME%% is dancing with the Devil. He is actually a great partner.
/me Look! %%NAME%% dances like there's nobody watching.
/me %%NAME%% is doing the step dance. Well, at least the "step" part.
/me %%NAME%% is dancing on the hands! Other people's hands.
/me %%NAME%% does the plumber dance. Tap dance! Badum tss.
pairdances: /me %%NAME%% is dancing the foxtrot, %%NAME2%% is dancing the wolfgallop.
/me %%NAME%% and %%NAME2%% are doing the twist in a 50's-themed restaurant.
/me %%NAME%% swings %%NAME2%% around. People duck away in fear.
/me %%NAME%% is shooting at the ground at %%NAME2%%'s feet and saying: "Dance!"
/me %%NAME%% puts a rose in the mouth. %%NAME2%%, being allergic to flowers, backs away.
/me "Take my hand," %%NAME%% said to %%NAME2%%. "I don't need it."
/me %%NAME%% tries to copy %%NAME2%%'s dance. %%NAME%% is doing the same.
/me %%NAME%% called %%NAME%%2 for a line dance. Somehow they are the only people in the line.
/me After hearing a rejection %%NAME%% just throws %%NAME2%% on the shoulder and happily starts to dance.
/me %%NAME%% and %%NAME%%2 are going round and round the room, hunting that elusive waiter with the wine.
/me %%NAME%% asks %%NAME2%% for a dance. Now for a break. And now for help!
/me %%NAME%% is dancing with %%NAME2%%, who isn't aware of it.
/me %%NAME%% learns from experience that %%NAME2%% uses the word "dance" as a euphemism.
/me %%NAME2%% tries to save %%NAME%% from a heart attack, who was actually just doing the robot dance.
welcomes: /me Welcome, %%NAME%%, to the Master of Instrumental computer-aided music enrichment center. Enjoy your stay.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%, you are now testing #CLASSIFIED#. Please try not to enjoy the music too much because it is not part of the test.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%% to the test chamber #42. To begin the test sit back, relax and listen to the music.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%. We want to inform you that someday all your wishes will come true. Please listen to this music while you wait.
/me Hello, %%NAME%%. Did you know that instrumental music greatly enhances your brain's capabilities? It is a true fact we certainly did not make up. Enjoy.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%. Here your brain can excercise its pattern-recognizing abilities. Or in other words, you can listen to some good music.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%. This is your first visit, so here are some rules: 1. Listen to the music. 2. Bob your head a little. 3. Feel irrationally happy.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%. We are happy to see a new face. Yes, we can see your face. Yes, through that camera you did not know about. Smile.
/me Hello, %%NAME%%. Nice for you to visit us. Would you like a warm cup of tea? Go and make it. And we will provide some heart-warming music for you.
/me Hello, %%NAME%%. Welcome to the greatest instrumental radio. As you can see we are testing our new truth-enhancing module. Oh, by the way, you look terrific!
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%. We predict that you will stay here for a long time. Although, our future-prediction system is not very accurate. Stay with us to see if we were right.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%. Be warned: we claim no responsibility if this music will make you want to sing, dance or live a happy life.
/me Welcome, %%NAME%%. We are very <insert an emotion> to see you! You are so <insert a compliment>. Stay with us and you will be awareded with a pice of <insert a lie>!
cookies: has given you a chocolate chip cookie!
has given you a soft homemade oatmeal cookie!
has given you a plain, dry, old cookie. It was the last one in the bag. Gross.
gives you a sugar cookie. What, no frosting and sprinkles? 0/10 would not touch.
gives you a chocolate chip cookie. Oh wait, those are raisins. Bleck!
gives you an enormous cookie. Poking it gives you more cookies. Weird.
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Why aren't you working on any projects?"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Give that special someone a compliment"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Take a risk!"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Go outside."
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Don't forget to eat your veggies!"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Do you even lift?"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "m808 pls"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "If you move your hips, you'll get all the ladies."
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "I love you."
gives you a Golden Cookie. You can't eat it because it is made of gold. Dammit.
gives you an Oreo cookie with a glass of milk!
gives you a rainbow cookie made with love :heart:
gives you an old cookie that was left out in the rain, it's moldy.
bakes you fresh cookies, it smells amazing.
langerror: /me The language you've selected isn't available. Please visit %%LINK%% to find a list of languages available.
retrievingdata: I am retrieving previously stored data.
datarestored: Previously stored data was successfully retrieved.
greyuser: Only bouncers and up can run a bot.
bouncer: The bot can't move people when it's run as a bouncer.
songknown: /me @%%NAME%%, this song is in the DJ history.
timelimit: /me @%%NAME%%, your song is longer than %%MAXLENGTH%% minutes, you need permission to play longer songs.
permissionownsong: /me :up: @%%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isblacklisted: /me This track is on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! Skipping...
isopen: /me The roulette is now open! Type !join to participate! (A game where a random participant is moved to a random position in the waitlist)
winnerpicked: /me A winner has been picked! @%%NAME%% to position %%POSITION%%.
ghosting: [%%NAME1%%] %%NAME2%% is either ghosting or not here.
alreadyadding: /me User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: /me Added @%%NAME%% to the queue. Current queue: %%POSITION%%.
notdisconnected: /me @%%NAME%% did not disconnect during my time here.
noposition: /me No last position known. The waitlist needs to update at least once to register a user's last position.
toolongago: /me @%%NAME%%'s last disconnect (DC or leave) was too long ago: %%TIME%%.
valid: /me @%%NAME%% disconnected %%TIME%% ago and should be at position %%POSITION%%.
warning1: /me @%%NAME%%, you have been afk for %%TIME%%, please respond within 2 minutes or you will be removed.
warning2: /me @%%NAME%%, you will be removed due to AFK soon if you don't respond.
afkremove: /me @%%NAME%%, you have been removed for being afk for %%TIME%%. You were at position %%POSITION%%. Chat at least once every %%MAXIMUMAFK%% minutes if you want to play a song.
roomadvertising: /me @%%NAME%%, don't post links to other rooms please.
adfly: /me @%%NAME%%, please change your autowoot program. We suggest PlugCubed: http://plugcubed.net/
whois: /me [%%NAME1%%] Username: %%NAME2%%, ID: %%ID%%, Rank: %%RANK%%, Joined: %%JOINED%%, Level: %%LEVEL%%, Language: %%LANGUAGE%%, Avatar: %%AVATAR%%, Status: %%STATUS%%%%PROFILE%%
newblacklisted: /me [@%%NAME%%] This track belongs on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! [ %%AUTHOR%% - %%TITLE%% - %%MID%% ]
voteskiplimit: /me [@%%NAME%%] Voteskip limit is currently set to %%LIMIT%% mehs.
voteskipexceededlimit: /me @%%NAME%%, your song has exceeded the voteskip limit (%%LIMIT%% mehs).
voteskipinvalidlimit: /me [@%%NAME%%] Invalid voteskip limit, please try again using a number to signify the number of mehs.
activeusersintime: /me [@%%NAME%% There have been %%AMOUNT%% users chatting in the past %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: /me [@%%NAME%%] Maximum afk duration set to %%TIME%% minutes.
inactivelonger: /me [@%%NAME%%] @%%USERNAME%% has been inactive longer than %%BOTNAME%%'s been online.
autowoot: /me We recommend PlugCubed for autowooting: http://plugcubed.net/
brandambassador: /me A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: https://plug.dj/ba
bouncerplusrank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You have to be manager or up to enable Bouncer+.
nousercookie: /em doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and eats a cookie himself.
selfcookie: /me @%%NAME%%, you're a bit greedy, aren't you? Giving cookies to yourself, bah. Share some with other people!
cycleguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The cycleguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
dclookuprank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only bouncers and above can do a lookup for others.
notinwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, you are not on the waitlist.
eta: /me @%%NAME%% you will reach the booth in approximately %%TIME%%.
starterhelp: /me This image will get you started on plug: %%LINK%%
roulettejoin: @%%NAME%% joined the roulette! (!leave if you regret it)
jointime: /me [@%%NAMEFROM%%] @%%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: /me [@%%NAME%%] you can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: /me [@%%NAME%%], @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from the community for %%TIME%% minutes.
lockskippos: /me [@%%NAME%%] Lockskip will now move the dj to position %%POSITION%%.
lockguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
addbotwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, don't try to add me to the waitlist, please.
mutedmaxtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can only mute for maximum %%TIME%% minutes.
muterank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
removenotinwl: /me [@%%NAME%%] Specified user @%%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
roomrules: /me Please find the room rules here: %%LINK%%
sessionstats: /me [@%%NAME%%] Total woots: %%WOOTS%%, total mehs: %%MEHS%%, total grabs: %%GRABS%%.
swapinvalid: /me [@%%NAME%%] Invalid user specified. (No names with spaces!)
swapwlonly: /me [@%%NAME%%] Please only swap users that are in the waitlist!
genres: /me Please find the permissible room genres here: %%LINK%%
unmuteeveryonerank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only managers and up can unmute everyone at once.
unmuterank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
commandscd: /me [@%%NAME%%] The cooldown for commands by users is now set to %%TIME%% seconds.
